title: AWS Capsule fails to install after enabling DND
content:
After enabling DND, Capsule Amazon AWS 18.4.1 may fail to install. You may see one of the following error messages displayed on the tile of the AWS capsule in Content Store:

Service design fails to deploy

or

Component palette failed to deploy

Cause

This issue occurs because the CI type palette may have multiple service component types or templates with the same name.

Solution

  1. Visit the ITOM Marketplace and download the next available version of the AWS capsule to your local file system.
  2. Go to the Content Store UI and select    from the toolbar to start installing the capsule from your local file system.
